group.name: XML Entity Catalogs
group.sample: Catalog entity resolver. External entities (e.g. DTDs, symbols, character entity sets, images) are resolved to local copies of the resources. The catalog manager facilitates the mapping between public identifiers or system identifiers and other system identifiers.
You will need the DocBook DTDs installed locally and the catalog properly configured.
